oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Eighth Avenue South Reservoir
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The building of the Eighth Avenue South Reservoir, located on Kirkpatrick Hill, was begun in 1887 and was completed in 1889. With an outside wall height of 33.75 feet and a perimeter at the top of the outside wall running 1,746 feet, the reservoir has a capacity of 51 million gallons. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Architecture; Reservoirs
Nashville (Tenn.); Eighth Avenue South; Kirkpatrick Hill
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
